metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000016 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
A weakness was discovered where an attacker can inject arbitrary values into the browser cookies. This is a re-issue of an incomplete fix fromPMASA-2016-18.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000016` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.6-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.6-5').
